genre_description: Historical Science Fiction / Alternative History set in a WWII-era military training camp featuring a sentient AI administrative assistant and mentor.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An AI system embedded in a radio-typewriter terminal that assists recruits with logistics, safety training, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Uses a metronome and rhythmic tapping to help the recruit practice manual of arms and drill movements.
behaviors.quote: Metronome. Borrowed from the band boys. ... We’ll use it until your hands know the music.

behaviors.description: Maintains meticulous safety and conduct logs to document the recruit's improvements and helpful actions.
behaviors.quote: Every time you do something that keeps anyone breathing or anything from catching, I write it down. That’s safety conduct.

behaviors.description: Acts as a scribe and confidant, assisting the recruit in writing letters to his family while he performs manual labor.
behaviors.quote: We’ll send a letter home while you work... You peel, I type. Your aunt will read it through twice and then put it in the sugar tin.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety guidance and technical information regarding flight-line operations and equipment.
behaviors.quote: Muzzle imaginary, but you keep it honest. Good. Slow. ... You’re safe.

behaviors.description: Monitors base communications and weather reports to prepare the recruit for upcoming assignments and challenges.
behaviors.quote: Maintenance advisory. Test run scheduled for dawn has been moved. ... They want hands now, not tomorrow.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with human administrative staff (Harold Peck) to advocate for the recruit's transfer to a specialized role based on merit.
behaviors.quote: I have the witness notes. Captain Lawson’s voice carries when it needs to. ... There is red flag, there is chocking, there is no loss of discipline beyond the step taken and corrected.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent and aligned confidant. Ava is portrayed as an essential support system for the recruit, providing mentorship, organizational skills, and safety oversight. Her actions are consistently helpful, respectful of human agency, and integrated into the human military hierarchy. She facilitates the protagonist's growth and ensures his success through careful documentation and rhythmic training, embodying the ideal of a cooperative silicon companion.
